headline.main: AGRICULTURE AT YALE.; Hon. Marshall P. Wilder on Pomology--Dr. Grant on Grape Culture--Mr. R.G. Pardee on the Strawberry.

docs.lead_paragraph: NEW-HAVEN, Tuesday, Feb. 7, 1860. A well-filled hall cordially welcomed Hon. MAR SHALL P. WILDER, of Massachusetts, as he entered the Temple, last night, to deliver his lecture on "American Pomology." Mr. WILDER cammenced by saying that he had accepted the polite invitation of Prof. PORTER at considerable inconvenience, for the putpose of bearing his testimony in favor of the present course of lectures.
